reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Capacity Building in the Field of Meteorology

description.narrative: The Finnish Meteorological Insitute is implementing a project in Kyrgyz Republic with the national institution Kyrgyzhydromet in the meteorological field. In the project it is intended to strengthen the capacity modernize the field and to train staff. Wit h the strengthening of the capacity the project aims to better anticipate natural disasters and the better availability of the information. The project promotes adapting to climate change and climate sustainability. The budget of the project is 502.200 Eur os

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland
